name: Solitarity
description:
Made as part of the Stay Safe Jam, this game was made by David Ryley and David Ryan in 1 day while both self-isolating in Galway, Ireland and Düsseldorf, Germany respectively.  In this game you play a white blood cell taking on waves of COVID-19. If you die and start over, the ghost of your previous play-through will join you in Solidarity.

Thanks for playing!

Controls: WASD to move. Mouse to aim. Left click to shoot.
